translation.en: My whole life, I've dreamt about being dead.
translation.es: Toda mi vida soñé con estar muerta.

translation.en: I leave my body, and I see myself from above.
translation.es: Abandono mi cuerpo y me veo desde arriba.
Una chica normal, de lo más normal.

translation.en: I stare at her perfect normality until I wake up
translation.es: Miro su total normalidad, hasta que despierto y veo que sigo siendo el monstruo de siempre.

translation.en: and realize that I'm still the freak I've been my whole life.
translation.es: hasta que despierto y veo que sigo siendo el monstruo de siempre.

translation.en: One thing I've learned since then...
life has a really fucked- up way of making your dreams come true.
translation.es: es que la vida tiene una forma retorcida de cumplirnos los sueños.

translation.en: Such a young and pleasant face.
translation.es: Un rostro tan joven y apacible.

translation.en: The Devil may present a pleasing visage. The better to seduce and influence the weak- minded.
translation.es: El Diablo puede tener rostro apacible para seducir e influenciar a los débiles.

translation.en: She will burn like those who spawned her.
translation.es: Arderá como los que la engendraron.

translation.en: You assume she is in Hell?
It wouldn't matter. She was in Hell already.

translation.es: Bueno… Nombre, edad y causa de muerte, para el registro.

translation.en: age, cause of death for the book.
translation.es: Nombre, edad y causa de muerte, para el registro.

translation.en: - Leave the cause of death blank. - I'm not supposed to--
translation.es: Deje en blanco la causa. - No se supone que… - Que la deje en blanco.
- No se supone que… - Que la deje en blanco.

translation.en: Forgive me, Sister, but I have to ask you to leave now
translation.es: Perdóneme, hermana, pero tendré que pedirle que se retire.

translation.en: so I can attend to some urgent matters.
But please remember, she cannot ask for forgiveness anymore,
translation.es: Por favor, recuerde que ella ya no puede pedir perdón,

translation.en: so it's up to us to forgive her.
translation.es: así que queda en nosotros perdonarla.

translation.en: For God knows all and sees all
translation.es: Porque Dios lo sabe todo y lo ve todo,

translation.en: I need somewhere to put her down.
You gotta get it all out before it kills her.
translation.es: Hay que sacárselo antes de que la mate.

translation.en: - How bad is it? - Let her work, Lilith.
Get the pieces out so she can heal.
translation.es: Saque las piezas para que sane.

translation.en: Your organs are pierced. Liver, spleen.
translation.es: Perforó los órganos: el hígado, el bazo.

translation.en: Several of these shards are keeping you from bleeding out.
translation.es: Las esquirlas impiden que te desangres.

translation.en: If I remove them, it could kill her.
- Can you give her something for the pain? -

translation.es: Nos las hemos visto más negras, ¿o no?

translation.en: Don't say it, Lilith. Don't even think about it.
translation.es: No lo digas, Lilith. Ni lo pienses.

translation.en: You think I want this? It's not up to us. There's a protocol.
translation.es: ¿Crees que quiero esto? No depende de nosotras. Hay un protocolo.

translation.en: - Sounds like the fight followed us here. - Six targets incoming.
translation.es: - Nos siguieron. - Se acercan seis objetivos.

translation.en: - The other Sisters will hold them off. - Not for long.
translation.es: - Las otras hermanas los detendrán. - No mucho.

translation.en: - - Mary. You know what needs to happen.
translation.es: Mary, sabes lo que debe pasar.

translation.en: Beatrice, get her out of here before I shoot her.
She is our leader. She's our friend.
We are not gonna give up on her.
Mary, I'm not gonna make it.
In this life or the next.
translation.es: En esta vida o en la próxima.

translation.en: - I'll buy us time. - You're needed here.
We need to turn her over.
All right, child, it's time for your walk.
translation.es: Muy bien, niña, es hora de caminar.

translation.en: - That tickles, Sister. - You think that's funny?
She will burn like those who spawned her.
translation.es: Arderá como los que la engendraron.

translation.en: Could you at least try to be anything but a burden on everyone around you?
translation.es: ¿Podrías no ser una carga para todos los que te rodean?

translation.en: - The poor child has left us. -
The poor child has left us.
Are we gonna talk about what happened back there?
translation.es: ¿Vamos a hablar de lo que pasó?

translation.en: No. That shit was a bad trip, and it can't be real.
translation.es: No. Esa mierda fue un mal viaje y no puede ser real.

translation.en: That's just you coming down from some powerful drugs.
translation.es: Solo era el efecto de drogas potentes.

translation.en: Maybe I'm dead, and this is Hell.
translation.es: Tal vez morí y esto es el Infierno.

translation.en: The nuns at the orphanage always said I was a good candidate.
translation.es: Las monjas del orfanato decían que yo sería buena candidata.

translation.en: At least here my legs work, so fuck those old crows.
translation.es: Al menos, las piernas me funcionan aquí. Que se pudran esas brujas.

translation.en: If this is Hell, then I'm gonna do it right.
translation.es: Si esto es el Infierno, lo disfrutaré.

translation.en: Maybe this is what going crazy feels like.
translation.es: Tal vez así se siente perder la cordura.

translation.en: I'm probably back in my bed at the orphanage, and all of this is just happening in my imagination.
translation.es: Probablemente, esté en mi cama y esto sea producto de mi imaginación.

translation.en: And I have completely lost my mental shit so bad, I have no idea.
translation.es: Y estoy tan demente que no me doy cuenta.

translation.en: And my brain is protecting me by making all of this seem really fucking real
translation.es: Y mi cerebro me protege al hacerme creer que esto es real

translation.en: to distract me from the fact that I'm a complete basket case.
translation.es: para distraerme del hecho de que soy un vegetal.

translation.en: No, but I might be dead.
Oh, my God. I'm sorry. That's so gro--

translation.es: Esta es la puta vida real.

translation.en: What are you up to, God?
Oh, I really hope this team doesn't suck.
translation.es: Espero que este equipo no sea pésimo.

translation.en: The nuns used to talk about miracles. Well, they were full of shit.
translation.es: Las monjas solían hablar de milagros, pero se la pasaban mintiendo.

translation.en: I'm not sure I'm ready to handle that.
translation.es: No sé si estoy lista para eso.

translation.en: At least I don't think I do.
To be honest, I've never really spent any time looking at myself.
translation.es: A decir verdad, nunca me miré mucho en el espejo.

translation.en: I know I should be grateful.
A lot of people would kill to have this sort of thing happen to them.
translation.es: Mucha gente mataría por vivir algo así.

translation.en: But you can't blame me for being confused.
translation.es: Pero es natural que esté confundida.

translation.en: There's gotta be a reason this is happening.
Someone did this to you, and that someone must have answers.
translation.es: Alguien me hizo esto y ese alguien debe tener respuestas.

translation.en: It was a rough first assignment.
You don't have to do that.
If we find out what holy relic did this, we can trace it.
translation.es: Si sabemos qué reliquia fue, podemos rastrearla.

translation.en: They followed us back here, Father. Engaged us.
No, before this. The recovery mission. Your assignment.
translation.es: No, antes. La misión de recuperación. Su tarea.

translation.en: There was more resistance than we expected. And by resistance, she means a private army.
translation.es: - Hubo más resistencia de la esperada. - Tenían un ejército privado.

translation.en: Armed mercenaries were at the delivery location.
translation.es: Había mercenarios armados en el destino.

translation.en: We secured the area, but when we went to retrieve the item,
translation.es: Aseguramos el área, pero, al recuperar el objeto,

translation.en: Sister Shannon was critically wounded, so we pulled back to our secondary position.
translation.es: La hermana Shannon fue herida y volvimos a la posición secundaria.

translation.en: - But they followed us-- - Stop doing that.
You are talking like it's just another incident to report.
translation.es: Hablas como si fuera un incidente cualquiera.

translation.en: I loved her, too. I just...
translation.es: Yo también la quería, pero necesito…

translation.en: What about the other Divinium fragments at the dock?
translation.es: ¿Y los demás fragmentos de divinium en el muelle?

translation.en: We need to secure them before someone else gets their hands on them.
translation.es: Debemos evitar que caigan en otras manos.

translation.en: Father Vincent, the monk has something to show us.
translation.es: Padre Vincent, el monje quiere mostrarnos algo.

translation.en: I hid after we were attacked.
And then she came in with El Halo
translation.es: Y luego entró ella con el Halo

translation.en: and put it inside a dead body to keep it safe.
translation.es: y lo puso en un cadáver para mantenerlo a salvo.

translation.en: The body of a young girl.
Human skin and tissue dampen the Halo's unique energy signature.
translation.es: La piel y el tejido humano debilitan la energía del Halo.
A menos que se desate su poder.

translation.en: Has it ever done that before, brought someone back?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez había hecho eso de revivir a alguien?

translation.en: You're saying some random, formerly dead civilian is out there
translation.es: ¿O sea que una civil cualquiera que estaba muerta

translation.en: with an angel's Halo inside her?
translation.es: anda por ahí con un halo de ángel?

translation.en: You're-- you're walking. You-- you're walking.
You went to sleep, and you never woke up.
I can move through walls... sometimes.
Maybe some kind of delayed zombification.
translation.es: Quizá es como una zombificación retrasada.

translation.en: Um, or your consciousness got transferred into another host body.
translation.es: O tu conciencia fue transferida a otro cuerpo huésped.

translation.en: Or you're a clone in some horrible experiment.
translation.es: O eres un clon en un experimento horrible.

translation.en: Whatever it is, you can't let anyone here see you like this.
translation.es: Sea lo que sea, no puedes dejar que nadie te vea así.

translation.en: Yeah. The Catholics are a little twitchy about who gets to be resurrected.
translation.es: Sí. A los católicos les inquieta el tema de quién es el que debe resucitar.

translation.en: Why do you want to know about her?
The girl's family perhaps? We were under the impression there was none.
translation.es: ¿La familia de la chica? Creíamos que no tenía a nadie.

translation.en: I don't want to get into the details, Sister.
translation.es: No puedo entrar en detalles, hermana.

translation.en: The girl is dead, as you said.
This is simply an attempt to gather information for a concerned party.
translation.es: Solo intento reunir información para un interesado.

translation.en: Well, yes, but if I knew--
I'm on official Vatican business. At the highest levels.
translation.es: Son asuntos oficiales del Vaticano de alto nivel.

translation.en: I don't have a lot of time.
This whole thing could just be temporary, like a glitch in the matrix.
translation.es: Todo esto podría ser temporal, como un error en la matriz.

translation.en: If I were you, I'd make the most of it while you still can
translation.es: Si fuera tú, aprovecharía todo lo posible

translation.en: before whoever did this to you finds you.
translation.es: antes de que el que hizo esto te encuentre.
Buscaré el expediente de la chica.

translation.en: And any information you might have on her friends...
translation.es: Y toda información que tenga sobre sus amigos

translation.en: or places she used to frequent.
and she certainly didn't have any friends.
You do know she was a quadriplegic?
translation.es: ¿Está al tanto de que era cuadripléjica?

translation.en: - What are you doing awake at this hour? - There was a pájaro.
Not exactly twenty- first- century care here, is it?
translation.es: No es un lugar muy moderno, ¿verdad?

translation.en: We do the best with the limited resources we are given, Father.
translation.es: Hacemos lo que podemos con los limitados recursos que nos dan.

translation.en: Were you and Ava good friends, Diego?
She seems like a special girl.
I'm gonna make the most of this.
translation.es: Voy a aprovechar esto todo lo posible.

translation.en: And just when you feel like you got this whole situation in hand,
translation.es: Y justo cuando siento que tengo todo controlado,

translation.en: And it draws you like a helpless insect into a flame.
translation.es: Y me atrae como un insecto indefenso a una llama.

translation.en: You follow, even though you know it's a bad idea.
translation.es: La sigo, aunque sé que es mala idea.

translation.en: How did Ava come to find herself at the orphanage, Sister?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que Ava vino al orfanato, hermana?

translation.en: Ava was only seven years old when she came to us.
translation.es: Ava tenía apenas siete años cuando llegó a nosotras.

translation.en: The result of a horrible car accident that took the life of her poor mother.
translation.es: Por un horrible accidente de auto que le quitó la vida a su pobre madre.

translation.en: and there was no other family that we could find.
translation.es: y no pudimos encontrar ningún otro familiar.

translation.en: But given that the mother was a Catholic, the child was placed in our care.
translation.es: Pero, como la madre era católica, la niña quedó bajo nuestro cuidado.

translation.en: I would like to say that she will be missed, but...
translation.es: Me gustaría decir que la extrañaremos, pero…

translation.en: but I can't go to sleep.
What if I wake up and I'm back to the way I was?
translation.es: ¿Y si me despierto y vuelvo a ser como antes?

translation.en: There's still so much to do.
Cold water. Shock to the senses.
translation.es: Agua fría. Un choque a los sentidos.

translation.en: Wait. Do my God powers include swimming? Because I just realized...
translation.es: Momento. ¿Mis poderes incluyen nadar? Porque me di cuenta…

translation.en: I got you! I got you!
Check that one off the list.
Don't do that thing where you forget to speak.
translation.es: No hagas eso de olvidarte cómo hablar.

translation.en: Uh, so, this is Chanel, Zori, and Randall.
translation.es: Bien, ellos son Chanel, Zori y Randall.

translation.en: Where are you from, Ava Nobody?
Come on. She's a mystery. We all love a good mystery, don't we?
translation.es: Vamos. Es un misterio. Y nos encantan los misterios, ¿no?

translation.en: The truth is, some people might be looking for me right now, so I'm happy to keep a low profile.
translation.es: Puede que estén buscándome, así que quisiera mantener un perfil bajo.

translation.en: - No. - Don't worry so much about who owns what.
translation.es: - No. - No te preocupes por quién es el dueño.

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you're squatting here or something.
translation.es: Ni que estuvieran aquí ilegalmente o algo así.

translation.en: Do we know who was at the docks? Why they were receiving a shipment of Divinium?
translation.es: ¿Sabemos quién estaba en el muelle? ¿Por qué recibían una carga de divinium?

translation.en: Let's distribute this to the entire diocese.
translation.es: Repartamos de estas a toda la diócesis.

translation.en: I want every priest, deacon, and nun in Andalusia on the lookout for her.
translation.es: Quiero que cada sacerdote, diácono y monja de Andalucía la busquen.

translation.en: Divinium exploding into her, ripping her to pieces.
translation.es: El divinium le explotó dentro y la hizo pedazos.

translation.en: This is how you kill a Warrior Nun.
translation.es: Así se mata a una monja guerrera.

translation.en: And they knew we were coming.
Why else would there be mercenaries waiting for us?
I don't know. All the more reason to find the Halo quickly.
translation.es: No lo sé. Con más razón, debemos encontrar el Halo rápido.

translation.en: Its power in someone untrained, untested, or unworthy is a danger to us all.
translation.es: Que lo porte alguien que no fue entrenada, probada o elegida es peligroso para todos.

translation.en: So, I find her, then what?
The Halo brought her back. Will removing it kill her?
translation.es: El Halo la trajo de vuelta. ¿Quitárselo la mataría?

translation.en: You need someone who's okay with that.
I need someone I can trust.

translation.es: A Lilith la mueve la ambición.

translation.en: You are who I rely on.
Well, not forever, but a few nights for sure.
translation.es: Bueno, no para siempre, pero sí unas noches.

translation.en: We tend to keep a busy schedule.
So, um, why are people looking for you?
Hey, you want to take a walk on the beach?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ir a caminar por la playa?

translation.en: Well, we're not taking anything that isn't already being offered up for free.
translation.es: Bueno, no tomamos nada que no se ofrezca por sí solo.

translation.en: That beach house? The owner lives in Saudi Arabia.
translation.es: Como esa casa. El dueño vive en Arabia Saudita.

translation.en: They come to Spain once or twice a year. The rest of the time it sits empty.
translation.es: Viene a España una o dos veces al año. El resto del tiempo está vacía.

translation.en: They don't rent it out. They don't Airbnb it.
translation.es: No la alquilan ni la rentan por Airbnb.

translation.en: So we pop in, we use it for a few weeks,
translation.es: Así que llegamos, la usamos unas semanas,

translation.en: we get it professionally cleaned before the owners return.
translation.es: la hacemos limpiar antes de que los dueños regresen.

translation.en: I don't know. Nobody gets hurt. Life is good.
translation.es: No sé. No hace daño. La vida es buena.

translation.en: Look, the system is rigged against people like us
translation.es: El sistema se opone a que gente como nosotros tenga dinero, una casa linda.
a que gente como nosotros tenga dinero, una casa linda.

translation.en: They-- they say if you work hard, you can get everything, etc., etc.
translation.es: Dicen que, si trabajas mucho, puedes tener todo y bla bla,

translation.en: But that's a lie. Okay? You gotta be in one of the...
translation.es: pero es mentira. Debes ser uno de los…

translation.en: I don't care what you're talking about. I just see lips I wanna kiss.
translation.es: No me importa de qué. Solo quiero ver esos labios besables.

translation.en: You know, they focus power in one direction, and everyone under them is just abused.
translation.es: Concentran el poder en una dirección y abusan de todos los demás.

translation.en: Yeah, that's right. We're pushing back.
- Making the most. - We're trying to.
There's just something that you need to know.
translation.es: Pero hay algo que debes saber.

translation.en: I'm sort of new-- new to this. I don't have a lot of life experience.
translation.es: Soy como nueva en esto. No tengo mucha experiencia en la vida,

translation.en: So, I may need your help to figure some stuff out.
translation.es: así que necesitaré ayuda para algunas cosas.

translation.en: Okay, I'm a strong woman. I don't need your help.
translation.es: Soy una mujer fuerte. No necesito tu ayuda.

translation.en: It's not like, Oh, help, you know? It's just a little help.
translation.es: No es como: ¡Ay, ayuda!. Es una ayudita.

translation.en: I do realize that I keep saying that word again. Help. And...
translation.es: Me doy cuenta de que sigo repitiendo esa palabra: ayuda.

translation.en: - I just said it again. I did it again. -
But did you just say anything?
I'm-- I'm wondering what I'm going to wear tonight.
Big party. There's a dance rave at the prison.
translation.es: Habrá una gran fiesta en la prisión.

translation.en: At the pris-- Like a real prison, or a club called the Prison?
translation.es: En la pri… ¿Una prisión de verdad o es el nombre de un club?

translation.en: I'm sorry about earlier today. We were in rough shape.
translation.es: Perdón por lo de hoy. Fuimos unos patanes.

translation.en: Strangers tend to make us a bit uncomfortable.
translation.es: Los extraños nos incomodan un poco.

translation.en: Yeah, no. No problem. It's fine.
translation.es: No. No hay problema. Está bien.

translation.en: Hey, I think this could look really great on you.
I can do some minor alterations.
Really? I-- I trust you. Yeah.  Oh, my God.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Confío en ti, sí. Dios mío.

translation.en: Normally, you kick my ass in sparring and don't break a sweat.
translation.es: Sueles patearme el trasero sin siquiera esforzarte.

translation.en: Today-- today, you were fighting something else while you were fighting me.
translation.es: Hoy peleabas contra otra cosa mientras peleabas conmigo.

translation.en: - Something's on your mind. - I'm working it out.
Come on. Give me something. I know it's not me. I'm a goddamn gift.
translation.es: Vamos. Cuéntame. Sé que no soy yo. Soy un puto regalo.

translation.en: You know I love you, right?
And I love all the girls here.
You protect the ones you love.
And I'm protecting you. And I'm protecting them.
translation.es: Te estoy protegiendo a ti y a ellas.

translation.en: I know this doesn't make much sense right now, but...
translation.es: Sé que no tiene mucho sentido ahora,

translation.en: it will some point in the future.
Just remember that we love you, too.
translation.es: Pero recuerda que nosotras también te queremos.

translation.en: ♪ That's the way every day goes ♪
♪ Every time we've got no control ♪
translation.es: Cada vez que no podemos controlar

translation.en: ♪ If the sky is pink and white ♪
translation.es: Si el cielo es rosa y blanco

translation.en: ♪ If the ground is black and yellow ♪
translation.es: Si el suelo es negro y amarillo

translation.en: ♪ It's the same way you showed me ♪
♪ Nod my head, don't close my eyes ♪

translation.es: A mitad de un movimiento lento

translation.en: ♪ Just the same way you showed me ♪
but I have somewhere to be.
♪ If you could fly Then you'd feel south ♪
translation.es: Si pudieras volar, sentirías el sur
El frío llegará al norte pronto

translation.en: ♪ Just the same way you showed me ♪
